title: interests StoneDrill
extract: StoneDrill is a less-used wiper tool, deployed in certain situations by the same Shamoon group. StoneDrill and Shamoon are used by different groups which are aligned in their interests.Mar 6, 2017
extract_html: StoneDrill is a less-used wiper tool, deployed in certain situations by the same Shamoon group. StoneDrill and Shamoon are used by different groups which are aligned in their interests.Mar 6, 2017
